entry.content: Image: Microsoft Flight Simulator‚Äôs latest DLC benefits the USO with a pair of WW2 classics To commemorate the 80th anniversary of the Allied invasion of Normandy during World War 2, Microsoft Flight Simulator recently launched its Famous Flyer 9 DLC, which adds two iconic pieces of aviation history. The $14.99 DLC currently available from the in-game marketplace adds the Douglas C-47 Skytrain and the Waco CG-4A glider. Sales of the DLC through July 5 will go to benefit the USO, a non-profit d...
